history.narrative: Law 20-82, the “Manufacturer Tasting Permit Act of 2013,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-234. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 5, 2013, and December 3, 2013, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 27, 2013, it was assigned Act No. 20-252 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-82 became effective on February 22, 2014.
